\w They|strong="H3808"\w* say, “\w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*; \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* pays \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w heed|strong="H7200"\w*.”

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w knows|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H3045"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w futile|strong="H1892"\w*.\f + \fr 94:11 \ft Cited in 1 Corinthians 3:20\f*

If \w I|strong="H3068"\w* say, “\w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* slipping,” \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* loving \w devotion|strong="H2617"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w supports|strong="H5582"\w* \w me|strong="H5582"\w*.
\w When|strong="H7230"\w* anxiety overwhelms \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w Your|strong="H7130"\w* \w consolation|strong="H8575"\w* delights \w my|strong="H7130"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.
